name: Mikhail Vorontsov
description:
The 211.61ft /64.5m Custom 'Mikhail Vorontsov' was built in 2013 by Dream Ship Victory.
Mikhail Vorontsov's interior layout sleeps up to 12 guests in 5 rooms, including a master suite, 2 double cabins, 2 twin cabins and 2 pullman beds. She is also capable of carrying up to 10 crew onboard to ensure a relaxed luxury yacht experience. Timeless styling, beautiful furnishings and sumptuous seating feature throughout to create an elegant and comfortable atmosphere.

name: Atlantic
description:
The 211.61ft /64.50m Custom 'Atlantic' was built in 2010 by Van der Graaf.
Atlantic's interior layout sleeps up to 12 guests in 6 rooms, including a master suite, 2 double cabins and 3 twin cabins. She is also capable of carrying up to 12 crew onboard to ensure a relaxed luxury yacht experience. Atlantic's impressive leisure and entertainment facilities make her the ideal charter yacht for socialising and entertaining with family and friends.
details: Faithful replica of one of the greatest sailing yachts ever built

name: Athena
description:
The 295.28ft /90m Athena was built in 2004 by Royal Huisman and last refitted in 2019.
Athena's interior layout sleeps up to 10 guests in 5 rooms, including a master suite, 3 double cabins and 1 twin cabin. She is also capable of carrying up to 19 crew onboard to ensure a relaxed luxury yacht experience. Superyacht Athena is a classically styled three masted gaff rigged schooner with all the latest amenities of a modern superyacht.
